CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Active'), CASE( TEXT(Price_Plan__r.Billing_Frequency__c), 'Monthly', Price_Plan__r.Price__c * Quantity__c, 'Quarterly', (Price_Plan__r.Price__c * Quantity__c) / 3, 'Semi-Annual', (Price_Plan__r.Price__c * Quantity__c) / 6, 'Annual', (Price_Plan__r.Price__c * Quantity__c) / 12, 0 ), 0 )
CustomField.label: MRR
